snippet.title: Swords & Soldiers 2 - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
http://www.swordsandsoldiers2.com
http://www.facebook.com/SwordsAndSoldiers
http://twitter.com/RonimoGames

Sharpen your axe, grab a tankard o' mead, and light up the barbecue! Witness the very first in-game footage of the upcoming Swords & Soldiers II, which is currently in development at Ronimo Games.

Swords & Soldiers II sends Redbeard and his gang of burly Vikings on an all-new adventure, making new friends and facing new enemies. This isn't just about who can organize the best barbecue party anymore -- this time the world also needs some serious saving!

More information on the new side-scrolling strategy game will be unveiled at GDC and PAX East!
